pr_title: Suggest and auto fill title and description based on image location

timeline.message: Suggest and auto fill title and description based on image location

timeline.bodyText: Is this intended to be empty?

timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: yup. there's no action on cancel. the dialog is dismissed automatically.
replies.author: maskaravivek
